review: Worked one time first time hooked up, Dead in the water the next day. Very disappointed with whole transaction especially being a Prime member and looks like I was charged freight back! Now unavailable from Amazon. Wonder why?ps My fire stick works just fine.
author: JIM

review: Wasn't quite what I expected, would like more ways to access "channels" I like. I'm being vague I know.... but I don't want to make a bad review based on what MY hopes for this product were. For what it is, it's good. Oh... Netflix is a breeze to use. There, something positive ;)
author: SisterHoney

review: Easy to install, easy to operate, good quality viewing.
author: FMW

review: This works great. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is I wish there were more "free" shows. You have to pay for a great many of them and that can be expensive. I really love the voice search it works great!!
author: A. Reader

review: It takes a little getting used to but worth the effort. I see a lot of programs I never would have seen with cable
author: Pamela Sullivan
